MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY16 postcode area of St. Andrews, affecting properties in South Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.36am. Repairs are taking longer than expected due to onsite difficulties and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2pm on Thursday 22nd October 2020.
